name: Slothtenberg Extensions
author: SlothGeek

sections.description:
Add attributes to some block to hidden on Desktop, Tablet or mobile. Also have the attribute to hide blocks when the user is loggend in or not.

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/slothtenberg-extensions directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. If you use the theme Tertius by SlothGeek the plugin install automaticaly.
sections.changelog:

  • Release

0.1.3

  • Add support to scroll animations for group and image blocks.

0.1.4

  • fix bugs

0.1.5

  • fix bugs

0.1.6

  • Add more configurations to animations behavior
